cause.description:
The use of Free and Open Source Software (FOSS) is actually better for the technology community because it can easily be customizable for the user to do exactly what they set out to do with the software. It provides better security and functionality and is all around better to use.
1. FOSS is easier to use
2. FOSS is safer to use
3. FOSS is easily customizable to fit user's needs.
cause.name: Spread Free and Open Source Software
